cards.title: Red
cards.description: Red foods remind us of berries and soft fruits, so we anticipate a sweet taste.

cards.title: Green
cards.description: Fresh, zingy green colours are reminiscent of unripe fruit, promising sour or acid flavours.

cards.title: White
cards.description: White foods evoke memories of salt and salty flavours, driving the expectation of a savoury treat.
